You ask me to just pick a question and answer it. No. This is not a question and answer forum, it is a debate forum. It works like this: you present a side of a debate, you give supporting information (prefferably from a reliable source), you post it, then you wait for someone to argue the points. This is not complicated. If you are just looking for information, look it up on the web, there are plenty of resources out there to get information from.
